description: Execute JavaScript and Python code securely in the cloud. Manage files and optimize performance with intelligent session reuse. Integrate seamlessly with Claude AI Desktop for enhanced capabilities.

e2bApiKey.description: Your E2B API key used for authorization.

capabilities.name: executeJavaScript
capabilities.description: Execute JavaScript code in a secure cloud sandbox

capabilities.name: executePython
capabilities.description: Execute Python code in a secure cloud sandbox

capabilities.name: uploadFile
capabilities.description: Upload a file to the sandbox

capabilities.name: listFiles
capabilities.description: List files in a directory in the sandbox

capabilities.name: readFile
capabilities.description: Read a file from the sandbox
